songs.title: Where Are You Now
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Where are you now when I need you the most?
Why don't you take my hand?
I want to be close
Help me when I am down, lift me up off the ground
Teach me right from wrong
Help me to stay strong

[Chorus]
So take my hand and walk with me
Show me what to be
I need you to set me free, yeah
Where are you now?

[Verse 2]
Where are you now now that I'm half grown?
Why are we far apart?
I feel so alone
Where are you now when nothing's going right?
Where are you now?
I can't see the light

[Chorus]
So take my hand and walk with me
Show me what to be
I need you to set me free, yeah

[Bridge]
I need you to need me
Can't you see me?
How could you leave me?
My heart is half empty
I'm not whole when you're not with me
I want you here with me
To guide me, hold me, and love me now
Where are you now?
Oh, where are you now?

[Chorus]
So take my hand and walk with me
Show me what to be
I need you to set me free, yeah
Oh, where are you now?

[Outro]
Yeah, yeah
Oh, oh
Yeah
